pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, December 15, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with Minister of Public Services and Procurement Anita Anand. Chief Public Health Officer of Canada Dr. Theresa Tam, Deputy Chief Public Health Officer of Canada Dr. Howard Njoo, and Major-General Dany Fortin will be in attendance. A media availability will follow.

Room 200
Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#
